xbow16
Firetooth +5
A human adventurer from the Dalelands named Arioth Cooper used this crossbow on many of his journeys. Arioth had lived in a small community near the edge of Anauroch, the great desert. When a mysterious force emerged from the sands to destroy the village, Arioth's wife was killed. Through circumstance, Arioth became a wandering mercenary. Over time, Arioth became a great hero and champion for the innocents of Cormyr and the Dalelands, though he shied away from such praise. His worn, light crossbow was probably the secret of his many successes, though how he came in possession of such a powerful tool is not known. When Arioth died of old age, his wishes were that his equipment be sold off at an auction in Essembra, Battledale, and the proceeds given to the citizens of that village.

The magical bowstring of Gond makes even the Firetooth Crossbow's enchanted missiles more accurate and more powerful.

NOTE: Firetooth requires no ammunition, but normal bolts cannot be fired with this crossbow. Fire Bolts are considered to be of +5 enchantment when determining what they can hit.

STATISTICS:

Combat abilities:
– Fire Bolt: target and opponents within 5 ft. suffer 1d8 fire damage

Over time, Arioth became a great hero and champion for the innocents of Cormyr and the Dalelands, though he shied away from such praise. His worn, light crossbow was probably the secret of his many successes, though how he came in possession of such a powerful tool is not known. When Arioth died of old age, his wishes were that his equipment be sold off at an auction in Essembra, Battledale, and the proceeds given to the citizens of that village.

xoband01
Circlet
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. Circlets carrying low-level enchantments are commonly worn by mages across Faerûn.

STATISTICS:

Weight: 1
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. Circlets carrying low-level enchantments are commonly worn by mages across Faerûn.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Protection contre les coups critiques

Poids : 1
xoband02
Silver Circlet
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. This simple silver circlet is enchanted to help the wearer successfully resist and avoid attacks of various natures.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Saving Throws: +1

Weight: 1
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. This simple silver circlet is enchanted to help the wearer successfully resist and avoid attacks of various natures.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Protection contre les coups critiques
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1

Poids : 1
xoband03
Eilistraee's Boon
This circlet is made of the purest silver, and is embedded with a shimmering green jewel that seems to emit a faint glow when caught by moonlight. It was blessed by the drow goddess Eilistraee, and is able to grant the wearer powerful protection against harmful magic for a short time.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Shield of the Archon (once per day): 1 turn

Weight: 1
This circlet is made of the purest silver, and is embedded with a shimmering green jewel that seems to emit a faint glow when caught by moonlight. It was blessed by the drow goddess Eilistraee, and is able to grant the wearer powerful protection against harmful magic for a short time.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Protection contre les coups critiques

Capacités de charge : 
- Shield of the Archon (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 1
xoband04
Circlet of the Archmagi
This powerful circlet was enchanted to complement the powerful robes customarily worn by archmages, building even further upon their magical protections. Due to the nature of its enchantment, it can only be worn by mages.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1
– Saving Throws: +1
– Magic Resistance: +5%

Weight: 1
This powerful circlet was enchanted to complement the powerful robes customarily worn by archmages, building even further upon their magical protections. Due to the nature of its enchantment, it can only be worn by mages.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Protection contre les coups critiques
- Classe d'armure : Bonus de 1
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1
- Résistance à la magie : +5 %

Poids : 1
